summary: Dual wield animation changes for third person
descriptionHtml:
Dual wield animation changes for third person

[youtube]ZzaNDMn_wtA[/youtube]
video is from v1-3, in v 1-5 runforward reverted to normal, turn left/right changed 

Install:
Extract .rar files and copy to your Skyrim folder
...Data/meshes/actors/character/animations

WARNING this mod still have a glitch: arrow position look misplaced sometimes, so this required mods below make arrow sheathe/scabbard disappear everytime you switch weapon or switch spells.

REQUIRES:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10753]Auto Unequip Ammo by Alek [/url]

Uninstallation 
Delete these files from /animations folder:

From 2handed        
1hm_attackpowerleft.hkx
1hm_attackpowerright.hkx

dodge animation     
1hm_runbackward.hkx
1hm_runleft.hkx
1hm_runright.hkx

from dagger animation  
dw1hm1hm_specialattackpower.hkx

from me
dw1hm1hmidle.hkx
1hm_idle.hkx
1hm_turnleft60.hkx
1hm_turnleft180.hkx
1hm_turnright60.hkx
1hm_turnright180.hkx

another mod 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30109]Running With Spells[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33249]Hold Your Torch Higher[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33412]Parkour Dovahkiin[/url]

feedback and endorse if you like this mod
author: robiehn

files.name: Dual Wield v1-5
files.changelogHtml:
change turn animation
delete runforward animation
change idle dw & idle 1handed
